items.headline: Oil prices are falling sharply. Lowered U.S.-Iran tensions and metals spillover is being blamed.
items.summary_en: Oil prices fell sharply on Monday after President Donald Trump said he was hopeful over negotiations with Iran, taking some of the fear premium out of the commodity.

items.headline: Hulk Hogan’s Florida home listed for $11 million, 6 months after his death
items.summary_en: Famed wrestler Hulk Hogan’s sprawling Clearwater home is on the market for $11 million, six months after the father of two died from cardiac arrest at the property.

items.headline: Google billionaire Sergey Brin buys a $42 million Tahoe mansion, a few months after buying a $50 million Malibu home
items.summary_en: Google billionaire Sergey Brin has been linked to two extravagant property purchases in neighboring states.

items.headline: Gold now down nearly $1,000 from peak as silver struggles following record 31% slump

items.headline: Italian lender loses nearly half its value on profit warning, CEO exit
items.summary_en: An Italian specialty finance lender that buys up the invoices from the Italian public sector lost nearly half of its value on Monday after the ousting of its chief executive and a profit warning.

items.headline: Michael Saylor’s Strategy sees bitcoin holdings trade below purchase price
items.summary_en: The bitcoin holdings of Michael Saylor’s Strategy were briefly underwater in a sign of the unwinding in cryptocurrency value this year.

items.headline: ‘Hell of a story, isn’t it?’: My brother stole $500K from my ailing father. Can we get justice?

items.headline: Oracle amps up its AI bet with a plan to raise as much as $50 billion this year
items.summary_en: After issuing an $18 billion bond offering last fall, Oracle intends to tap the debt and equity markets anew in 2026.

items.headline: U.S. stock futures fall after bitcoin’s weekend drop, as gold and silver’s sell-off may be bleeding into other markets
items.summary_en: U.S. stock futures fell Sunday, after a weekend slide by bitcoin and Friday’s massive sell-off in precious metals capped a tumultuous first month of 2026.
